title: Privacy Policy
intro: This policy describes what data the DataShift service (the “Service”) collects and how it is used. By using the Service, you agree to data processing in accordance with this policy.
section1Body: We may collect: account information (email, name), technical metadata about interface actions, error and event logs, and data you upload to work with migrations and datasets.
section2Body: Data is used to provide access to functionality, improve the quality of the Service, diagnose issues, ensure security, and comply with legal requirements.
section3Body: We take reasonable organizational and technical measures to protect data from unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission and storage can guarantee absolute security.
section4Body: You may request access to your data, have it corrected or deleted, and restrict processing. To exercise your rights, contact us using the details below.
section5Body: We may update the privacy policy from time to time. The current version is always available on this page.
